name: tweet_detail_conversation
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitter_v2.
Tool description: Twitter public data API for Tweets and users
API description: Retrieves the detail and conversation about a specified tweet using the RapidAPI Twitter API.

tweet_id.description: The ID of the tweet to retrieve details and conversation for.

cursor.description: A parameter for pagination to fetch additional results in the conversation thread. Defaults to None.
